line_1: Their diff'ring Forms and Ways of Life relates;
line_2: And sings their constant Loves, and constant Hates;

line_1: The Cur the bloody tale relates,
With moving Tears th' unhappy Tale relates,
line_2: Oft blames her Son, but more the cruel Fates,

line_1: When oh! with grief the Muse relates
line_2: Sent by an order from the fates

line_1: Where other cares than those the Muse relates,
line_2: And other shepherds dwell with other mates;
How we're afflicted by the fates.
